title: Diagnosis of Misconceptions in Engineering Metallurgy Concepts and Blended Learning Intervention Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Students hold conceptual misconceptions about metallurgical phenomena, requiring diagnostic assessment tools and personalized learning strategies; learners access content via individual devices

learning_goals: Students can accurately identify and explain at least three major conceptual misconceptions in the field of engineering metallurgy.
Through blended learning interventions, students can reduce conceptual error rates by over 40%.
Students can analyze self-diagnostic assessment results to develop personalized learning plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
